title: Michael Michaud Sunflower Brooch
description:
This sunflower brooch pays tribute to one of four of Vincent Van Gogh’s still-life paintings that feature the eye-catching yellow blooms in Paris during the late summer of 1887. A beautiful addition to a blazer or a coat that can add a pop of color to any ensemble.

Details:

• Cast in bronze with a hand-patina finish

• Accented with a 24k gold finish, 22k gold leaf, and amber stones

• Dimensions: 2" x 2.5"

• Clean with soap and water utilizing a damp cloth

• Handmade in the USA
